text: Frederick Watson (30 November 1888 – 29 June 1917) was a Scottish professional football wing half who played in the Scottish League for Aberdeen. == Personal life == Watson served as a trimmer in the Royal Naval Reserve during the First World War and died of heart failure on 29 June 1917.
